DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the efficacy of valsartan+chydochlorothiazide in patients with stage 2 hypertension and cardiovascular risk factors.
DOC.criteria: Patients who give consent Men and women 18 to 80 years of age Patients with hypertension (systolic >159 mm, diastolic >100 mm) Patients meeting laboratory criteria Pregnant women Women not using approved contraception methods Secondary hypertension Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
